titleStmt.title: The French King proved a bastard: or The amours of Anne (Queen to Lewis XIII.) With the Chevalier de Roan.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper at the Mitre in Fleet-street near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Price 4 d.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Mitre in Fleet-street near Temple-Bar
